Entry.JapaneseText: 祭司様はひとり、ガジュマとヒューマの間に 立って、がんばってたんだネ。
Entry.EnglishText: The priest tried his best to mediate between the Huma and the Gajuma, didn't he?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマを港に隔離するというやり方は 決して賢明とは言えない策だが……
Entry.EnglishText: The practice of segregating the Gajuma into the harbor was not a wise move, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族や争いを解決する方法に、正解などない。 彼は彼なりに努力したんだろう……
Entry.EnglishText: There is no perfect solution for resolving these racial conflicts. I assume he was striving for that in his own way...

Entry.JapaneseText: ボクたち以外にも、がんばってる人が いるって、なんか嬉しいよネ！
Entry.EnglishText: It makes me kinda happy that there are people besides us who are giving it their best.
